name: Mealieverse Demo
description:
Mealieverse.

Welcome, please enjoy the game.

As far as gameplay goes, it's pretty self explanatory, arrow keys to move, X to Jump, Z to attack with your sword, and A to use your blaster. You can change keybinds with the F1 Key, or restart the game with the F5 Key. The ESC key will bring up the game in fullscreen, and the P button will pause.
